!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

blog.name: whiskersandquiff
blog.title: We Love Dan Howell
blog.description: AJ | 19 | she/her | cishet ace | Was rosaflagephil | Creator of philmerch, fic writer, admin on the Phandom Writing Challenge blog. I do accept prompts in my ask box :)

body:
Drabble #2

AO3

This drabble is brought to you by @phloridas, who began with:

2009 dan counting down the days until he can see phil even though it’s only been a couple weeks but it feels like an eternity and letting out a giant breath when he finally runs into phil’s arms that feel more like home than anything he’s ever experienced

He can’t sleep the night before he sees phil because he’s too excited and nervous that Phil’s changed his mind about dan. When Phil’s at the train station, dan cries. Every. Time. Every visit, dan happy-cries when he’s in Phil’s arms again. The night before he has to leave phil he sleeps fitfully- he’s so comfortable tucked against phil but he’s sad he has to leave. He cries on the train home and has a hard time sleeping the next night in a too-big bed in a too-quiet room and he’s too warm and too cold at the same time because he just wants phil

summary: I missed a sim's ep once upon a time, so for the next few months I just didn't watch any so it became my least favourite series....
question: I missed a sim's ep once upon a time, so for the next few months I just didn't watch any so it became my least favourite series. I've caught up now but they're so BAD at the game it stresses me out watching dalien's moodlets all turn red. I acknowledge that this is the series that gives them most views, but I wouldn't mind another
answer:
hey b! this is totally valid, and i’ll be honest (don’t come for me) i’m not the biggest fan of the sims series myself. i think they do a good job of making it entertaining, but, to your point, they don’t play it well. they play it for the sake of entertainment.

also, i agree wholeheartedly - i’m always here for a new let’s play series!!

reblog.comment:

also, i agree wholeheartedly - i’m always here for a new let’s play series!!
